      • findRepositoryByName

        @GetMapping(value="/repository/{owner}/{nameRepository}")
public java.lang.Iterable<br.com.trustly.model.Repositories> findRepositoryByName(@PathVariable(value="owner")
                                                                                    java.lang.String owner,
                                                                                    @PathVariable(value="nameRepository")
                                                                                    java.lang.String nameRepository)
                                                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Receives the owner and the repository. Before accessing GitHub by Scrapping, check if you already have it in the database in memory or if there is a processing in progress. If there is a processing for the directory in question, the application awaits termination. The param receives the owner of the github repository
        Parameters:
        owner -
        nameRepository -
        Returns:
        List
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
